title: How do I change my password without email verification?
body: HI! How can I change my password without mail verify? I no longer have the email. Is that a way to change password and also mail?

replies.body: A PW reset would have to be sent to the registered address.  You can also update your info to another email, just submit an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Our account team will take a look and get things in order with you.  See you there!
